channel.title: The Ace Watkins Presidential Hour
channel.itunes:summary: Ace Watkins is the only Gamer running for President of the United States. Join Ace and his staff as he travels the country solving the problems of Gamers and non-Gamers alike. Powered by Pulitzer-prize winning video game journalism website Hard Drive (hard-drive.net).
channel.itunes:author: Ace Watkins
channel.description: Ace Watkins is the only Gamer running for President of the United States. Join Ace and his staff as he travels the country solving the problems of Gamers and non-Gamers alike. Powered by Pulitzer-prize winning video game journalism website Hard Drive (hard-drive.net).

item.title: Lag in Iowa
item.itunes:title: Lag in Iowa
item.description: Gamer candidate for president Ace Watkins and his team discuss the awful lag in the Iowa Caucus, the DNC trying to shove awful DLC characters down our throat like Michael Bloomberg, how to reach the mom-voters of America through their gaming children, and much more.
item.content:encoded: Gamer candidate for president Ace Watkins and his team discuss the awful lag in the Iowa Caucus, the DNC trying to shove awful DLC characters down our throat like Michael Bloomberg, how to reach the mom-voters of America through their gaming children, and much more.

item.title: Not Solo; Squad
item.itunes:title: Not Solo; Squad
item.description: Load up the menu, make sure the image on the left is barely visible, and press start: the Ace Watkins Presidential Hour has officially launched. Ace and his staff get into some discussion of policy, answer calls from supporters, check in with their West Coast strategist, and hum the theme from Halo.

item.title: The Ace Watkins Presidential Hour: Teaser
item.itunes:title: The Ace Watkins Presidential Hour: Teaser
item.description: The Ace Watkins Presidential Hour airs every Thursday beginning January 30. Subscribe now to be the first to listen when episode 1 drops!
